automationtype.name: Selenium
automationtype.content: Object, Locator Type, Action, Value, Run, Verdict

step.action: Log into Oracle CRM
step.observation: System should be able to login into oracle CRM successfully.

step.action: Click on Individual Customer Creation
step.observation: System should navigate to the customer creation page successfully

step.action: Select option to create customer as : Manually
step.observation: System should allow the user to be created manually .

step.action: Choose Customer type : Individual
step.observation: Customer type individual should be selected

step.action: Choose ID type : Civil
step.observation: System should allow Iqama IDto be selected

step.action: Fill all the mandatory fields : - Customer ID - ID expiry date - Gender - Nationality - Arabic Title / Name / Last name - Address type / Country / Postal / Base type / City
step.observation: System must allow all the mandatory details to be filled

step.action: Validate & Create new customer
step.observation: System must Validate details and create a new account

step.action: Choose ID type : passport
step.observation: System should allow Iqama IDto be selected

step.action: Choose ID type : any
step.observation: System should allow any IDto be selected

step.action: Choose ID type : Family ID
step.observation: System should allow any IDto be selected

step.action: Log into Siebel CRM
step.observation: System should be able to login into CRM successfully .

step.action: Search the Customer account created in the MSA Channel - with the Customer ID
step.observation: System should search the customer created in the MSA Channel successfully .

step.action: Navigate to the Customer List View
step.observation: System should navigate to the Customer List View

step.action: Check whether the customer account is created
step.observation: Customer Account created in MSA Channel must be successfully created .

step.action: Log into the portal via external channels
step.observation: System should be able to Log in successfully .

keyword.name: Search the customer ... anyone of the following parameterCustomer NameId TypeCustomer ID MSISDN

step.action: Search the customer with using anyone of the following parameter: -Customer Name -Id Type -Customer ID -MSISDN
step.observation: System should search the customer and fetch the customer account

step.action: Navigate to Customer List View .
step.observation: System should navigate to the Customer List View

step.action: Click on the modify button , choose the task and invoke the task
step.observation: System should allow the CSR to modify the demographic details of the customer .

step.action: Update the customer demographic details ( like mail, Address , etc., )
step.observation: System must update the customers demographic details

keyword.name: Search the Customer account ... created in the External Channels like Kiosks with the Customer ID

step.action: Search the Customer account created in the External Channels like Kiosks - with the Customer ID
step.observation: System should search the customer created in the External Channels like Kiosks successfully .

step.action: Check whether the customer account is created
step.observation: Customer Account created in External Channels like Kiosks must be successfully created .

step.action: Log into Oracle CRM .
step.observation: System should be able to login into oracle CRM successfully.

step.action: Click on Corporate Customer Creation Task
step.observation: System should navigate to the customer creation page successfully

step.action: Choose the number of levels to be created for the customer .
step.observation: System should allow the user to choose the number of levels to be created for the customer

step.action: Choose the number of connection / subscribers to be created .
step.observation: System should allow the CSR to choose and create number of subscribers to be created .

step.action: Choose the Bill cycle
step.observation: System should allow the CSR to select and fix the bill cycle for the customer

step.action: select the authorized person : for primary contact
step.observation: System should allow the CSR to choose the primary contact for the authorized person

step.action: select the KAM and contact information
step.observation: System should allow the CSR choose the key account manager contact details and should create information for KAM

step.action: .Fill the Company Specific Details : - ID type & number - Organization category - ID Expiry date & Category - Company name in Arabic - Company other details like size , type , sector , segment
step.observation: System must allow the CSR to fill and create company specific details for the customer .

step.action: Fill the Address Information details - Address - Address details , city , avenue , country ,..etc.
step.observation: System should allow the CSR to create and fill the details for the address of the customer

step.action: Fill in the details for the Billing - Bill Frequency - Bill SMS Notification - Currency - Invoice format - Media Type - Currency - other details
step.observation: CSR must be able to create and fill details for the Billing account

step.action: Click next & proceed to CUSTOMER ORG HEIRARCHY
step.observation: System must allow the CSR to create customer organization hierarchy for the customer .

step.action: Organize the HIERARCHY with respect to the Account details.
step.observation: System must create the Hierarchy ( with respect to A/c details )

step.action: Click next & account is created
step.observation: System must Validate the details and account is to be created .

step.action: Log into Oracle CRM .
step.observation: System should be able to Log in successfully .

keyword.name: Search the Individual ... anyone of the following parameterCustomer NameId TypeCustomer ID MSISDN

step.action: Search the Individual customer with using anyone of the following parameter: -Customer Name -Id Type -Customer ID -MSISDN
step.observation: System should search the customer with the following parameters and fetch the customer account

step.action: Navigate to Customer List View .
step.observation: System should display the customer as " BLACK LISTED " customer by marking the blacklist flag checked

step.action: Click on Individual Customer Creation
step.observation: System should be able to login into oracle CRM successfully.

step.action: Select option to create customer as : Manually
step.observation: System should create customer manually process

step.action: Choose Customer type : various
step.observation: .CSR must be able to choose the customer type : any <>

step.action: Customer Sub type : any
step.observation: CSR must be able to choose sub type as : any <>

step.action: Choose ID type :any Blacklisted ID
step.observation: System should not allow the customer account to be created since the given ID matches with the BLACKLISTED ID

step.action: Select option to create customer as : Manually
step.observation: System should allow the user to be created manually

step.action: Validate and create new customer account
step.observation: System must Validate details and create a new account

step.action: Login to Siebel CRM with admin access
step.observation: Login to Siebel CRM with admin access should be successful

step.action: Navigate to access management Screen
step.observation: Navigate to access management Screen should be successful

step.action: Assign the user to multiple groups
step.observation: User should be successfully assigned to multiple groups

step.action: Login to Siebel CRM with user access
step.observation: Login to Siebel CRM with user access should be successful

step.action: Check whether the user is able to access the multiple groups assigned to him
step.observation: User should be able to access the multiple groups assigned to him

keyword.name: Check whether the user ... able to access the prepaid customer data assigned to him as responsibility

step.action: Check whether the user is able to access the prepaid customer data assigned to him as responsibility
step.observation: User should be able to access the prepaid customer data assigned to him as responsibility

keyword.name: Check whether the user ... to access the postpaid customer data assigned to him as responsibility

step.action: Check whether the user is able to access the postpaid customer data assigned to him as responsibility
step.observation: User should be able to access the postpaid customer data assigned to him as responsibility

keyword.name: Check whether the user ... able to access the MBB customer data assigned to him as responsibility

step.action: Check whether the user is able to access the MBB customer data assigned to him as responsibility
step.observation: User should be able to access the MBB customer data assigned to him as responsibility

step.action: Login to Siebel CRM with individual agent position
step.observation: Login to Siebel CRM with individual agent position should be successful

keyword.name: Check whether the user ... is able to access Zain customer data based on individual agent position

step.action: Check whether the user is able to access Zain customer data based on individual agent position
step.observation: User should be able to access Zain customer data based on individual agent position

step.action: Login to Siebel CRM with team access control
step.observation: Login to Siebel CRM with team access control should be successful

step.action: Check whether the user is able to access Zain customer data based on team access control
step.observation: User should be able to access Zain customer data based on team access control

step.action: Login to Siebel CRM with parent position
step.observation: Login to Siebel CRM with parent position should be successful

keyword.name: Check whether the admin ... able to control the access and views of the agent to access customer data

step.action: Check whether the admin is able to control the access and views of the agent to access customer data
step.observation: Admin should be able to control the access and views of the agent to access customer data

step.action: Login to Siebel CRM with agent credential
step.observation: Login to Siebel CRM with agent credential should be successful

step.action: Check whether agent receive the inbound call
step.observation: Agent should receive the inbound call

keyword.name: Check whether system ... creates an interaction record once the call is disconnected by the customer

step.action: Check whether system creates an interaction record once the call is disconnected by the customer
step.observation: System should creates an interaction record once the call is disconnected by customer

step.action: Check whether system creates an interaction record once the call get hanged up inbetween
step.observation: System should create an interaction record once the call get hanged up inbetween

step.action: Login to Siebel CRM
step.observation: Login to Siebel CRM should be successful

step.action: Navigate to service request screen
step.observation: Navigate to service request screen should be successful

keyword.name: Check whether service ... request created in remedy application is displayed with necessary fields

step.action: Check whether service request created in remedy application is displayed with necessary fields
step.observation: Service request created in remedy application should be displayed with necessary fields

step.action: Navigate to 360 degree view
step.observation: Navigate to 360 degree view should be successful

test.name: To validate creation of a Customer B2C through CRM By providing Iqama ID
test.description: 1. Valida Access to Seibel CRM

test.name: To validate creation of a Customer B2C through CRM By providing Passport for visitors on travel visa
test.description: 1. Valida Access to Seibel CRM

test.name: To validate creation of a Customer B2C through CRM By providing GCC ID
test.description: 1. Valida Access to Seibel CRM

test.name: To validate creation of a Customer B2C through CRM By providing Civil ID
test.description: 1. Valida Access to Seibel CRM

test.name: To validate whether supports creation of a Customer B2C through MSA Channel
test.description: 1. Valida Access to Seibel CRM

test.name: To validate whether the system support to update customer demographic Mail Address etc information from external channels
test.description: Existing Individual / Corporate Customer

test.name: To validate whether supports creation of a Customer B2C through External systems like KIOSKS
test.description: 1. Valida Access to Seibel CRM

test.name: To validate creation of a B2B customer through CRM with unique Company Registration number
test.description: Unique company registration details

test.name: To validate whether the system should support to mark or flag the customer as black listed
test.description: Customer to be updated as blacklisted (after the account is created ) from DEBT management .

test.name: To validate whether the system does not allow creation of a new customer if the customer is already in blacklist
test.description: Blacklisted Customers ID

test.name: To validate capturing the Address as Mandatory during Creation of a B2C customer process
test.description: 1. Valid Access to CRM

test.name: To validate capturing the Address as Mandatory during Creation of a B2B customer process
test.description: To validate capturing the Address as Mandatory during Creation of a B2B customer process

test.name: Verify that the admin is able to assign the user to multiple groups
test.description: 1. Admin user should already exist in system 2. Agent user should already exist in system

test.name: Verify that the user is able to access the prepaid customer data based on assigned responsibility
test.description: 1. User should already exist in system with assigned responsibility for prepaid customer data

test.name: Verify that the user is able to access the postpaid customer data based on assigned responsibility
test.description: 1. User should already exist in system with assigned responsibility for postpaid customer data

test.name: Verify that the user is able to access the MBB customer data based on assigned responsibility
test.description: 1. User should already exist in system with assigned responsibility for MBB customer data

test.name: Verify that the Zain customer data is accessed based on the individual agents position
test.description: 1. User should already exist in system with individual agent position

test.name: Verify that the Zain customer data is accessed based on the team access control
test.description: 1. User should already exist in system with team access control position

test.name: Verify that the Parent position of the agent is able to control the access and views of the agent to access the customer data
test.description: 1. User should already exist in system with parent position

test.name: Verify that Creation of interaction through inbound call once the call disconnected by the customer
test.description: 1. Customer should have initiated inbound call

test.name: Verify that Creation of interaction through inbound call once the call gets hanged up in between
test.description: 1. Customer should have initiated inbound call

test.name: Verify that system allows CSR to query the SR from remedy application for a customer
test.description: 1. Service request should be already created for the customer in remedy application

test.name: Verify that the CSR able to view the history of SR s of a customer in 360 degree view
test.description: 1. Service request should be already created for the customer in remedy application
